backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, app settings, sermon cache, and app release info with permission checks via AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to involved files, components, and test IDs for app settings and location persistence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files including settings, location, prayer, weather, and UI components.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Guide and template for wrapping the web app in an Android WebView, including JS–Android bridge and notification integration.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS variables and Tailwind base layers defining light/dark themes, color tokens, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading fonts, favicon, Android widget bridge script, and the React app root.
frontend/public/android-widget-bridge.js: JavaScript bridge exposing global functions for updating Android prayer widgets via WebView interfaces with input validation.
frontend/src/androidPushBridge.d.ts: Declares the AndroidPush interface for sending detailed prayer-time JSON to the Android WebView wrapper. Includes methods for transferring next, daily, and weekly prayer data.
frontend/src/androidWidgetBridge.d.ts: Defines global functions and an AndroidPrayer interface for updating Android widgets with next, daily, and weekly prayer times. Provides HH:MM-based update methods and widget-facing APIs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component implementing tab navigation, decorative backgrounds, header UI, and integration of major feature tabs.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Exports an AuthButton component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/HeaderFlourish.t: Renders a centered decorative image flourish used in page headers.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Implements a mobile tab navigation bar with icons, overflow menu, and tab content areas for many app sections.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Shows a card prompting the user to pick a location, with a button triggering navigation.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Provides a dropdown menu listing additional tabs not shown in the main bar, invoking a callback when a tab is selected.
Exports structured morning and evening adhkar arrays defining titles, Arabic text, translations, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Renders morning and evening adhkar lists with completion tracking, reset actions, and scrollable layout.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Defines the current app version constant used for update checks.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Provides semantic version comparison and a helper to check if a version is newer.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: Displays a dismissible update alert when the backend version is newer than the current version and not previously dismissed.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: Stores and retrieves dismissed update version info in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook that checks via actor whether the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: Fetches the latest app release metadata from the backend with graceful failure handling.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: Mutation hook to update release metadata and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Defines dua categories and provides categorized dua data.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: UI for browsing dua categories, listing duas, and viewing details in a dialog.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Renders a stylized card for an Esmaül Hüsna item with Arabic name and transliteration.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Defines the EsmaulHusnaItem interface and exports an array of items containing Arabic names, transliterations, Turkish meanings, and related duas.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Displays all Esmaül Hüsna items as cards and shows detailed meaning and dua in a dialog.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: Implements the fasting tracker UI, allowing users to log voluntary and make-up fasting dates, set targets, and manage Ramadan day statuses.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Displays a 30‑day Ramadan fasting checklist with progress, day status toggles, and a reset option.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: Provides a Quran reading progress tracker where users update their last read page and view progress toward 604 pages.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Computes the current prayer slot by comparing the current time to adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Renders the home view showing location selection, adjusted prayer times, weather, weekly times, and next‑prayer countdown with widget updates.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifButton.t: A button wrapper adding an Islamic tile-pattern overlay while preserving standard button variants and behavior.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifFrame.ts: A layout wrapper that applies optional ornamental motifs or divider graphics around its children.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays the next prayer time and remaining countdown, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Renders a grid of prayer-related content cards with modal details based on current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/home/SahurIftarStr: Shows sahur and iftar times with a live countdown, hidden during loading or errors.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Provides a list of dua items with Arabic text, Turkish meaning, and usage context.
Contains a dataset of hadith items including Arabic text, Turkish translation, and sources.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports an array of Quran verses with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useAndroidPus: React hook that builds and sends detailed prayer-time payloads to Android Push, avoiding duplicate sends with cached JSON.
frontend/src/features/home/useAndroidWid: React hook that sends daily, weekly prayer times and city name to Android widgets, with deduplication for each payload.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: Tracks the current prayer slot and updates it every minute using getCurrentPrayerSlot.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: Computes next prayer, remaining time, and nextPrayerMillis with minute updates, sending legacy Android bridge notifications when values change.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content per prayer slot using seeded selection.
frontend/src/features/home/useSahurIftar: Calculates sahur and iftar countdowns based on fajr and maghrib times, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/WeeklyPrayerT: Displays a weekly prayer schedule table with loading and error fallback cards.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching locations via geocoding, displaying results, and saving the selected location into app settings.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Provides functions to search locations using Open-Meteo API and convert geocoding results into internal Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Location and GeocodingResult objects.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: Custom React Query hook that performs debounced geocoding searches based on input text.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Renders namaz tutorial content with gender-specific steps and displays daily prayer rakat counts.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Contains structured content for namaz steps and prayer rakat information for men and women.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Utility functions for calculating Haversine distances and formatting them for display.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Component allowing users to search for a temporary or default location to use for nearby mosque searches.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: Queries Overpass API for nearby mosques, extracts coordinates and metadata, computes distances, and returns a sorted list.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Main tab for nearby mosque functionality, handling location selection and displaying mosque results within a radius.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: Defines the NearbyMosque interface with ID, name, coordinates, distance, and optional address.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: React Query hook that fetches nearby mosques when location is available and caches results.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Contains notification templates for generic and prayer-time alerts with helpers to format messages.
frontend/src/features/prayer-tracker/Pra: UI component for tracking daily and missed prayers, allowing toggles and counter adjustments stored in settings.
Fetches daily prayer times from the Aladhan API and formats the response.
frontend/src/features/prayer/aladhanWeek: Fetches a week's prayer times from Aladhan API and builds localized day labels.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes kerahat windows and merges them with prayer times into a sorted timeline.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays prayer times with offsets and kerahat windows, handling loading, errors, and location selection.
Applies minute offsets to individual or sets of prayer times with wraparound handling.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that retrieves daily prayer times for a given location.
frontend/src/features/prayer/useWeeklyPr: React Query hook that retrieves weekly prayer times for a given location.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: React component that displays Qibla direction using device orientation, handles location selection, and shows UI cards based on state.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Utility functions to compute Qibla bearing using great-circle math and normalize angles.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: React hook that manages device orientation permissions and returns compass heading data.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/qura: Frontend API wrapper for fetching surah metadata, content, translations, and audio with caching.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/Qura: Main Qur'an learning tab that loads surah lists, displays reader mode with audio playback, and restores reading state.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useA: Custom hook providing audio playback controls and state management for ayah-by-ayah recitation.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useQ: Hook that persists and retrieves Qur'an reading progress using app settings.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Static dataset defining sections of basic fasting information with headings and paragraph arrays. Exported as structured content for display in the Ramadan tab.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Static list of 30 daily Ramadan menus, each with sahur and iftar items. Used for rotating daily meal suggestions.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: React tab component showing Ramadan info, prayer times, location selection, Tarawih content, and a rotating daily menu. Handles missing location state and renders multiple informational sections.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Static content describing Tarawih prayer details, including structure and Ramadan-related notes. Exported as title and section list.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: Hook that returns the menu for the current day and updates automatically at midnight. Selects menus deterministically based on day of year.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Utility functions for day calculations and date formatting in Turkish locale. Provides start-of-day normalization and day-difference logic.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri events to Gregorian dates by scanning the year and matching Intl-formatted Hijri parts. Produces computed religious day objects.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Static predefined list of major Islamic dates in 2026 with Gregorian and Hijri metadata. Used as the dataset for religious day displays.
Type definitions for Hijri events and computed Gregorian religious days. Provides structure for event conversion and display models.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: UI component rendering 2026 religious days with next upcoming highlight and full list display. Uses computed data from a custom hook for dates and status flags.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: React hook returning 2026 religious days, next upcoming event, and remaining days using memoized date logic.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: Empty placeholder file for a Friday sermon tab component.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Empty placeholder hook for fetching the latest sermon.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin-only UI for updating latest app release version and Play Store URL with validation and success/error states.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Type definitions for all app settings including location, notifications, fasting, Qur’an progress, and prayer tracking.
frontend/src/features/settings/durableLo: IndexedDB-based storage helpers for persisting and retrieving the user’s selected location.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Loads, saves, and migrates app settings using localStorage with fallback to durable location storage.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Settings UI allowing users to adjust prayer time offsets and per-prayer notification lead times.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: React Query hook that loads, caches, and updates app settings with local persistence.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Static dataset defining tasbihat items with phrases, Arabic text, translations, and counts.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: UI component rendering tasbihat items in scrollable cards with Arabic text, transliteration, and translations.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Displays a compact weather snippet showing temperature and description using location-based weather data.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather from Open‑Meteo and maps response fields to an internal WeatherData format with a code-to-text description helper.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: Provides a React Query hook to fetch and cache weather data based on a selected location.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Renders a detailed weather card with temperature, conditions, wind, and humidity, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital counter UI with target tracking, progress display, and persistence via app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and initializes AuthClient with stored or new credentials.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light/dark themes and prayer-specific accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/androidBridge.ts: Offers safe wrappers for calling Android WebView bridge functions to update prayer widgets and daily prayer data.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Provides functions to send native Android notifications via a WebView bridge, with fallbacks when unavailable, plus helpers for generic and prayer notifications and checking bridge support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and feature requests related to durable location persistence.
